items.sentence: If you don't mind, I think I'll stay a little longer.
Tom earned money by working at the local supermarket.
Tom didn't tell us why he couldn't come to our party.
Tom was caught red-handed trying to steal a bracelet.
Tom was born in Australia and grew up in New Zealand.
It's only a matter of time before the meteor strikes.
Keep stirring until the solution becomes translucent.
I put on my bathrobe after getting out of the shower.
My laptop battery doesn't last as long as it used to.
If I hadn't already eaten, I would've eaten with you.
